data.description: Excellent service. Quick response, efficient troubleshooting and resolution with full explanation of the problem. Gotta love Team!
It has been a pleasure working with you and your staff, and I can only rave over the high standards that you have maintained relative to our hardware and software.

The Buggplayer team did a very good job in pulling together the data I needed when I couldn't find the time to do it myself. It has been a pleasure working with the team, and I am pretty sure I will ask buggplayer for help again in the future.
We had a brilliant experience working with BuggPlayer. They delivered great solutions, the quality of their work was excellent and was all delivered on time. The team was a pleasure to work with
